prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that has a vibrant yellow body with striking black stripes.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with a round body and oversized ears, perfect for a children's game.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small humanoid creature with electric-themed accessories.
Generate a character that has a playful personality and loves to zap its friends with sparks.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban settings, always buzzing with energy and excitement.
Design a tiny creature that can evolve into a powerful electric beast, showcasing its potential.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, with a focus on electric attacks.
